item.title: CVE-2022-1912|2024-08-03T00:17:00.963Z -- smartsoftbuttonwidget -- button%20widget%20smartsoft
item.description: The Button Widget Smartsoft plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.0.1. This is due to missing nonce validation on the smartsoftbutton_settings page. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the plugins settings and inject malicious web scripts via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
